Comment 1: 
When we StartProcess on windows, we ask for all process handles to be inherited by our
child:

http://golang.org/src/pkg/syscall/exec_windows.go#L316

(see bInheritHandles of CreateProcess api).

@Russ: I am not sure if we should flick that flag over, or make it user-defined.

Alex
